scenario: Basic site with two pages
step_name: I have an "index.md" page that contains "[About my projects]({% link about.md %})"
glue_code:
Given(%r!^I have an? "(.*)" page(?: with (.*) "(.*)")? that contains "(.*)"$!) do |file, key, value, text|
  File.write(file, <<~DATA)
    ---
    #{key || "layout"}: #{value || "none"}
    ---

    #{text}
  DATA
end

scenario: Basic site with two pages
step_name: I have an "about.md" page that contains "[Home]({% link index.md %})"
glue_code:
Given(%r!^I have an? "(.*)" page(?: with (.*) "(.*)")? that contains "(.*)"$!) do |file, key, value, text|
  File.write(file, <<~DATA)
    ---
    #{key || "layout"}: #{value || "none"}
    ---

    #{text}
  DATA
end

scenario: Basic site with two pages
step_name: I run jekyll build
glue_code:
When(%r!^I run jekyll(.*)$!) do |args|
  run_jekyll(args)
  if args.include?("--verbose") || ENV["DEBUG"]
    warn "\n#{jekyll_run_output}\n"
  end
end

scenario: Basic site with two pages
step_name: I should get a zero exit status
glue_code:
Then(%r!^I should get a zero exit(?:-| )status$!) do
  step %(I should see "EXIT STATUS: 0" in the build output)
end

scenario: Basic site with two pages
step_name: the _site directory should exist
glue_code:
Then(%r!^the (.*) directory should +(not )?exist$!) do |dir, negative|
  if negative.nil?
    expect(Pathname.new(dir)).to exist
  else
    expect(Pathname.new(dir)).to_not exist
  end
end

scenario: Basic site with two pages
step_name:
I should see "

About my projects

" in "_site/index.html"
glue_code:
Then(%r!^I should (not )?see "(.*)" in "(.*)"$!) do |negative, text, file|
  step %(the "#{file}" file should exist)
  regexp = Regexp.new(text, Regexp::MULTILINE)
  if negative.nil? || negative.empty?
    expect(file_contents(file)).to match regexp
  else
    expect(file_contents(file)).not_to match regexp
  end
end

scenario: Basic site with custom site-wide-permalinks
step_name: I have a configuration file with "permalink" set to "pretty"
glue_code:
Given(%r!^I have a configuration file with "(.*)" set to "(.*)"$!) do |key, value|
  config = \
    if source_dir.join("_config.yml").exist?
      SafeYAML.load_file(source_dir.join("_config.yml"))
    else
      {}
    end
  config[key] = SafeYAML.load(value)
  Jekyll.set_timezone(value) if key == "timezone"
  File.write("_config.yml", YAML.dump(config))
end

scenario: Linking to a ghost file
step_name: I should see "Could not find document 'contact.md' in tag 'link'" in the build output
glue_code:
Then(%r!^I should (not )?see "(.*)" in the build output$!) do |negative, text|
  if negative.nil? || negative.empty?
    expect(jekyll_run_output).to match Regexp.new(text)
  else
    expect(jekyll_run_output).not_to match Regexp.new(text)
  end
end
